alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 10:36PM AKST until February 02 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 9 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area including Yakutat. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 9 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Wet snow may be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is expected in Yakutat beginning Tuesday afternoon. Heaviest snowfall rates likely from late Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. Snow may transition to a period of light freezing rain Wednesday afternoon and evening before a change over to rain by Thursday. Dry snow will become wetter and more dense through the day on Wednesday. Confidence is low regarding the exact timing of the transition to rain.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
